```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(tidyverse)
library(ggpubr)
```
```{r}
make.df5 <- function(denomItem){
  a <- data.frame(c(5,degSize),c(pathSize,denomItem))
  x <- fisher.test(a)
  return(x$p.value)
}

make.df10 <- function(denomItem){
  a <- data.frame(c(10,degSize),c(pathSize,denomItem))
  x <- fisher.test(a)
  return(x$p.value)
}

make.df15 <- function(denomItem){
  a <- data.frame(c(15,degSize),c(pathSize,denomItem))
  x <- fisher.test(a)
  return(x$p.value)
}
```
```{r}
denom <- seq(from = 10000, to = 40000, by = 100)
degSize <- 1200
###########
pathSize <- 50

x5 <- lapply(denom, make.df5)
x5.Plot <- as.data.frame(cbind(denom,unlist(x5)))
colnames(x5.Plot) <- c("BkgrSize","pval")

x10 <- lapply(denom, make.df10)
x10.Plot <- as.data.frame(cbind(denom,unlist(x10)))
colnames(x10.Plot) <- c("BkgrSize","pval")

x15 <- lapply(denom, make.df15)
x15.Plot <- as.data.frame(cbind(denom,unlist(x15)))
colnames(x15.Plot) <- c("BkgrSize","pval")

pl.50 <- ggplot() + geom_point(data=x5.Plot, aes(x=BkgrSize, y=pval), color="black") + geom_point(data=x10.Plot, aes(x=BkgrSize, y=pval), color="blue") + geom_point(data=x15.Plot, aes(x=BkgrSize, y=pval), color="red") + geom_hline(aes(yintercept=0.05, linetype="dashed", color = "red")) + ylim(0, 1)
###########
pathSize <- 200

x5 <- lapply(denom, make.df5)
x5.Plot <- as.data.frame(cbind(denom,unlist(x5)))
colnames(x5.Plot) <- c("BkgrSize","pval")

x10 <- lapply(denom, make.df10)
x10.Plot <- as.data.frame(cbind(denom,unlist(x10)))
colnames(x10.Plot) <- c("BkgrSize","pval")

x15 <- lapply(denom, make.df15)
x15.Plot <- as.data.frame(cbind(denom,unlist(x15)))
colnames(x15.Plot) <- c("BkgrSize","pval")

pl.200 <- ggplot() + geom_point(data=x5.Plot, aes(x=BkgrSize, y=pval), color="black") + geom_point(data=x10.Plot, aes(x=BkgrSize, y=pval), color="blue") + geom_point(data=x15.Plot, aes(x=BkgrSize, y=pval), color="red") + geom_hline(aes(yintercept=0.05, linetype="dashed", color = "red")) + ylim(0, 1)
###########
pathSize <- 500

x5 <- lapply(denom, make.df5)
x5.Plot <- as.data.frame(cbind(denom,unlist(x5)))
colnames(x5.Plot) <- c("BkgrSize","pval")

x10 <- lapply(denom, make.df10)
x10.Plot <- as.data.frame(cbind(denom,unlist(x10)))
colnames(x10.Plot) <- c("BkgrSize","pval")

x15 <- lapply(denom, make.df15)
x15.Plot <- as.data.frame(cbind(denom,unlist(x15)))
colnames(x15.Plot) <- c("BkgrSize","pval")

pl.500 <- ggplot() + geom_point(data=x5.Plot, aes(x=BkgrSize, y=pval), color="black") + geom_point(data=x10.Plot, aes(x=BkgrSize, y=pval), color="blue") + geom_point(data=x15.Plot, aes(x=BkgrSize, y=pval), color="red") + geom_hline(aes(yintercept=0.05, linetype="dashed", color = "red")) + ylim(0, 1)

```

```{r,fig.width=10, fig.height=3}
ggarrange(pl.50,pl.200,pl.500, legend = FALSE, ncol=3, nrow=1) 
```

```{r}
phyper(6,200,20000-200,200)
```
